sentence: There are no more Goldwaters in the GOP The select committee reached out to Minority Leader McCarthy and Republican Reps. Scott Perry and Jim Jordan to talk about Jan. 6, but they are not cooperating.
author: EJ Montini
title: 7½-hour phone gap? Did Donald Trump channel Rose Mary Woods on Jan. 6?

sentence: She’d join the undistinguished ranks of Marjorie Taylor Greene, Lauren Boebert, Matt Gaetz, Jim Jordan, and Madison Cawthorn.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Guess It Wasn’t Just A Cry For Help: Sarah Palin Really Running For Congress

sentence: One was Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), the influential de facto dean of the party’s right flank in Congress, the House Freedom Caucus.
author: Sam Brodey
title: Sarah Palin Is Back. Her GOP May Have Moved On.
